sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, a Republican, issued a legal opinion in February declaring that Ducey has the power to use National Guard troops and state law enforcement to forcibly send migrants back.
author: ACACIA CORONADO and PAUL J. WEBER
title: Ex-Trump officials urge Texas Gov. Greg Abbott to declare border crossings an 'invasion'

sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, a Republican, issued a legal opinion in February declaring that Mr Ducey has the power to use National Guard troops and state law enforcement to forcibly send migrants back.
author: Via AP news wire
title: Ex-Trump officials pressure Texas Governor Greg Abbott to declare ‘invasion’ along Mexico border
